text: @senatemajldr Dude, take your balls back from trump and do your damn job. Our nation is bleeding, our people are dying, and your privileged ass sits there bitching about @SpeakerPelosi instead of working on coronavirus relief. I pray @AmyMcGrathKY womps your ass in the election. #VoteBlue
